summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Amanda Kirby and others discussing the transfer of funds related to 'Jeepers Inc.' It confirms the receipt of cash and mutual fund assets, indicating financial transactions associated with Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, involved in the communication regarding the financial transactions related to Epstein.

persons.name: Vahe
persons.context: Vahe is involved in the financial discussions and confirms the receipt of cash and mutual fund assets for Jeepers Inc.

persons.name: Paul Tazia
persons.context: Paul Tazia is copied on the email, indicating involvement in the financial matters discussed.

persons.name: Kevin
persons.context: Kevin is also copied on the email, suggesting he is part of the internal discussion regarding the financial transactions.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Vahe are communicating about financial transactions, indicating a professional relationship.
Amanda Kirby includes Paul Tazia in the email, suggesting a working relationship within Deutsche Bank.
Amanda Kirby includes Kevin in the email, indicating a professional connection related to the financial matters.

events.title: Transfer Confirmation for Jeepers Inc.
events.description: Confirmation of the transfer of cash and mutual fund assets for Jeepers Inc. related to Epstein.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154-0004
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby confirms the transfer of funds related to Jeepers Inc.
A total of approximately $539 million in cash and $1.5 million in mutual funds were received.
The email correspondence is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
